# inputDelegate

**Instance Property**

An input delegate that receives a notification when text changes or when the selection changes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var inputDelegate: (any UITextInputDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The text input system automatically assigns a delegate to this property at runtime. It is the responsibility of the view that adopts the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInput] protocol to notify the input delegate at the appropriate junctures.

## Handling text input

- **UITextInputDelegate**: An intermediary between a document and the text input system.
